SUCCESS STORIES - SUMMARY

CASE STUDY – PORTFOLIO ANALYTICS SERVICES
SITUATION
▪
Client has an excellent track record of investments over the past 25 years and has an experienced team of investment, strategic and 
operational professionals
▪
Merilytics partnered with the client to provide high quality analytical services for its portfolio companies
▪
Analyze the portfolio companies’ financials and internal data to identify revenue and cost savings opportunities
▪
Conduct a competitor pricing analysis and identify optimal prices for the portfolio company’s products to maximize the profitability
▪
Conduct supply chain analyses to identify issues with portfolio company’s demand planning, inventory management and logistics
▪
Analyze industry database for Retail sector to identify competitive product characteristics and further acquisition opportunities
▪
Analyze market survey data from portfolio company and draw insights on product performance, brand attributes and customer behaviors 
using factor, derived importance and cluster analysis methodologies
VALUE ADDITION
IMPACT
▪
Our in-depth analysis with short turnaround times allowed the client to enhance the value of its portfolio companies
▪
Portfolio companies realized higher revenues (through pricing changes and better demand planning) and higher EBITDA (through lower 
inventory and shipment costs)
▪
Increased efficiency and effectiveness of portfolio operating team
ABOUT THE CLIENT
Client is a leading private equity firm that takes majority ownership in small and mid-cap companies in the consumer segment in North America
